column1: obituary for robert g. 'bob' agin | j. e. foster funeral homes| robert g. agin
column5: passed away peacefully at his home saturday
column9: son of the late chester e. and martha e. brand agin. he was retired from the state of florida highway dept. and he was a veteran of the u. s. marine corp. there will be no services for bob and his burial will be held at the convenience of his family. a full obituary will appear at a later date. arrangements are in the care of the j. e. foster funeral home in toronto. www. jefosterfh. com
